derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or via late Latin from Greek epikuklos, from epi 'upon' + kuklos 'circle'

means.word_mean: 1. a circle that rolls around (inside or outside) another circle; generates an epicycloid or hypocycloid
